Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with exceptional quality. This product not only fulfills its intended purpose but also adds value to your daily life by enhancing efficiency and convenience. Given its unique features and high standards, we believe it's worth more than $150. Considering its exceptional value, I am offering you the opportunity to own this product for $200. I trust this investment will provide you with significant benefits and satisfaction. Please let me know if you're interested in making this purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
